attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think people on jobseekers and the dole they should have to do more to get there money like street cleaning. also i think they should only be allowed to claim for 1 year then not again for 3 years you make it to easy for people to stay at home and live off TAX PAYERS MONEY.also i think people that get pregnet should not get 1st prioraty to housing as girls are doing it on purpose because they no they can get houses where people that need them dont this is a FACT.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
